details.Description: Developer of digital therapeutics designed to automate chronic condition management through AI. The company offers fully autonomous therapeutics powered by proprietary medical AI, featuring real-time guidance, adaptive behavior tracking, contextual voice support, and instant meal analysis, enabling patients with chronic conditions, such as diabetes and Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), to manage their conditions more affordably and independently.
details.Vertical(s):

details.Description: Developer of health monitoring devices designed to track and control glucose levels.
